definition: to plea for leniency/to ask for a favor
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
feeling/emotion/passion/situation
to beg for forgiveness (idiom)

sentences.english: My brother would have lost the argument if Dad hadn't interceded for him.
sentences.chinese: 如果当时父亲不替哥哥求情，他就会输掉这场争论。

sentences.english: Jinxiu slaps herself to beg the customer to let Bingding off.
sentences.chinese: 客人要告丙丁，锦秀于是自打耳光为丙丁求情。

sentences.english: He interceded with the teacher for me.
By using only may know abundant propaganda, to plead Christine.
sentences.chinese: 浚知丰只利用梅宣传，向婷求情。

sentences.english: Since Chou-heung ask for mercy, I won't kill you.
sentences.chinese: 既然秋香帮你求情，就免你一死。

sentences.english: Straight line change the subject, the LeiLei to find some more letter to intercede for heart flat.
sentences.chinese: 行直转移话题，着雷蕾多找一些人士为心平写求情信。

sentences.english: Wench said, red interceded with dried tangerine or orange peel to February.
sentences.chinese: 丫头见状，便向二月红替陈皮求情。

sentences.english: Intercede letter may play a role, the heart flat call social services only, need not go to jail.
sentences.chinese: 求情信起了作用，心平只判罚社会服务令，不用入狱。

sentences.english: By the root to replace the captain, Johnson & Johnson off pig eggs to intercede.
sentences.chinese: 由阿根接替队长，强生前去求情放掉猪蛋。

sentences.english: ZhangLiHua revealed that the second idea is to the palace to the queen.
sentences.chinese: 张丽华透露第二个主意便是入皇宫向皇后求情。

sentences.english: Ruth's hand sought Martin's beseechingly under the table, but his blood was up.
sentences.chinese: 露丝的手在桌下求情似的寻找着马丁的手。

sentences.english: Tries to give the child to intercede, Haitian agreed, Mr Wan is not gas.
sentences.chinese: 乐儿给那个小孩求情，海天同意了，庞万却气的不行。

sentences.english: Mother interceded with the father for the daughter.
sentences.chinese: 母亲替女儿向父亲求情。

sentences.english: She interceded with my father for me.
At this time so it aside for tall people intercede.
sentences.chinese: 此时太了也在一旁为高大人求情。

sentences.english: Iplead with you, Elijah. Ask your God for forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 我请求你，以利亚，向上帝求情宽恕我吧。

definition: to intercede/to plead for sb else
to apologize humbly/to beg forgiveness
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
to exculpate/to absolve/to exonerate
to offer an explanation/to plead innocence/to try to defend oneself
to cry out a grievance
to entreat piteously/to implore
to appeal for justice/to demand redress for a grievance
to put forward a suggestion (to sb in a senior position)/to offer a word of advice
to shield (a miscreant) from punishment, criticism etc/to take sb's side
to persuade/to exhort/to advise
to tell on sb/to complain (to a teacher, a superior etc)/to bring a lawsuit
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
to complain of an injustice/to lament sb's misfortune
to beg/to beseech/to entreat/entreaty
